name: Crack Towers
description:
This game was made in 3 hours for https://itch.io/jam/trijam-31 - where the theme was "Towers!"

All of the graphical assets were supplied - by the amazing Kenney library https://kenney.nl/assets

To move - arrow keys left and right

To Break Cracked Blocks - space bar

Try to break as much towers - without missing the cracks!
